section.title: Overview
section.p: Jaeger configurations may be made in the values.yaml file as part of the OpenTracing configurations.

The following is an example of the OpenTracing and Jaeger configurations in the values.yaml.opentracing: headers: "x-request-id,x-b3-traceid,x-b3-spanid,x-b3-parentspanid,x-b3-sampled,x-b3-flags,b3" jaeger: endpoint: "http://jaeger-collector.istio-system.svc.cluster.local:14268/api/traces"

section.title: Header configuration
section.p: In the values.yaml, the headers property can be used to configure which headers are propagated.opentracing: header: <your_headers_here>
Where <your_headers_here> is a comma separated list of headers to propagate.

For example, the following is configured to propagate headers x-request-id, x-b3-traceid, x-b3-spanid, x-b3-parentspanid, x-b3-sampled, x-b3-flags, and b3.opentracing: headers: "x-request-id,x-b3-traceid,x-b3-spanid,x-b3-parentspanid,x-b3-sampled,x-b3-flags,b3"

section.title: Endpoint configuration
section.p: In the values.yaml, the endpoint property can be used to configure endpoints, which tell Jaeger where to send traces collected in NCC.opentracing: headers: "x-request-id,x-b3-traceid,x-b3-spanid,x-b3-parentspanid,x-b3-sampled,x-b3-flags,b3" jaeger: endpoint: <endpoint_address>
Where <endpoint_address> is the address of the endpoint to which Jaeger will send traces.

For example, the following is configuration sends traces to the endpoint at http://jaeger-collector.istio-system.svc.cluster.local:14268/api/traces.opentracing: headers: "x-request-id,x-b3-traceid,x-b3-spanid,x-b3-parentspanid,x-b3-sampled,x-b3-flags,b3" jaeger: endpoint: "http://jaeger-collector.istio-system.svc.cluster.local:14268/api/traces"
